item.title: Hugo: posts and terms per taxonomy
item.description: Counting the number of posts and different terms per taxonomy in Hugo requires looping through all taxonomies. {{ range $taxname, $tax := .Site.Taxonomies }} {{ $nposts := len (where $.Site.RegularPages (print "Params" "." $taxname) "ne" nil) }} {{ $nterms := len $tax }} {{ $posttext := cond (gt $nposts 1) "posts" "post" }} {{ $termtext := cond (gt $nterms 1) "terms" "term" }} {{ $taxname }}: {{ $nposts }} {{ $posttext }} and {{ $nterms }} search {{ $termtext }}.
